decorators module¶

Decorators for Messenger server side.

decorators.compression_middleware(func)¶

Decompress request and return compression result.

decorators.json_middleware(func)¶

Load bytes JSON to dict and return bytes JSON.

decorators.log(func)¶

Log the passed function name, caller function name and module name where the functions is calling. Also args and kwargs are logged too. :param (<class ‘function’>) func: Handled function. :return (<class ‘function’>): Decorated function.

decorators.login_required(func)¶

Check that user is logged in based on the valid token exists in request.
